standard.nc: 2.4 - Disinfectant approval will be checked by NIFCC
3.13/3.15 - Confirmation of registration with UFAS Compounder/Merchant Scheme to be verified by NIFCC
6.2 - Confirmation of registration with ABM (Transport) Scheme/FQAS Beef & Lamb Scheme to be verified by NIFCC

I acknowledge that the inspector has carried out an inspection and has brought to my attention areas where non-conformances have been identified. I understand that these inspection results are provided for information only at this stage. This report does not indicate wether or not I will be awarded a certificate.

field.title: 1. I confirm that all the information given in this document is correct to the best of my knowledge.
2. I agree to abide by the Product Standard and Rules of the Northern Ireland Beef and Lamb Farm Quality Assurance Scheme.
3. I agree to the details contained in this inspection report being divulged to the Livestock and Meat Commission for purposes in connection with the FQAS Helpline service.
4. I agree to inform Northern Ireland Food Chain Certification of any changes in my circumstances to those declared in this document.
I have completed this report and confirm that the information detailed is a true and accurate account of the inspection.
I have also provided the participant with a copy of the fully completed and accurate non-conformance report.
